# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that specifies whether the system reports double taps or squeezes on Apple Pencil to your app.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: isEnabled
